chat.msg: Welcome!
Hello
Hello! Welcome to our map navigation game. Are you ready to start exploring the map and follow the path I will guide you through?
Yes, I am ready
Great! Let's begin. You are currently at the top-right corner of the map. Can you describe what you see around you?
I can see few island with few wild animals

That's correct! We have a path that will take us through the islands and the wild animals. Let's start by heading left. Move a few steps to the left until you see a small island with a leopard resting on it. Can you spot the leopard?
I notice a tiger is resting but did not see any leopard

Apologies for the confusion, it seems the tiger has taken the leopard's spot. No worries, let's adapt our path. Instead of going left, let's go a few steps to the right. This will lead us to a small island with a tiger resting on it. Can you see the tiger now?
Yes I can see a tiger
Perfect! Now, from the island with the tiger, I want you to look for a wooden twig that leads to a larger island. Can you see the twig and the larger island ahead?
Yes I can see
Great! Walk along the wooden twig and reach the larger island. Once you're there, let me know what animals you can spot on this island.
An elephant and a bird I can see
Wonderful! Now, I want you to walk over the head of the bird (parrot) and continue south towards the elephant. Let me know when you have reached the area between the parrot and the elephant.

chat.msg: Welcome!
hello
Hello! Are you ready for an adventure? We're going to navigate through a map together. Can you please describe where you are and what you see?
Yes, I am ready. Currently I am top right corner near the dog
Great! You're in the top-right corner near the white dog. Now, I want you to take a few steps to your left, passing below a wooden bench. Can you do that and let me know when you've reached there?
Yes, reached there

Fantastic! Now, from the wooden bench, I want you to cross a stream towards a florist stand. But instead of reaching the stand, make a u-turn to your left and cross the stream again to head back towards the white dog. Let me know when you're back near the dog.
Make a u-turn and crossed the the stream again and reached near the white dog

Great job! Now, just near the white dog, you'll see a wooden branch crossing a river. I want you to cross over the branch and continue heading southwards (down the map). Let me know when you've crossed the branch.
Crossed over the bench and continue heading southwards

Oops! Sorry for the confusion. Let's backtrack a bit. Remember the wooden branch crossing the river near the white dog? I want you to cross over that branch and continue heading southwards (down the map). Let me know when you've crossed the branch.
Crossed the branch
Great! Now, as you head southwards, you'll come across another white dog sitting next to a red and white checkered picnic. Can you see it? Can you please describe what you see around you?

chat.msg: Welcome!
Hello
Hello! Welcome to our navigation game. Are you ready to embark on a fun adventure?
Yes, I am ready

Great! Let's begin. You are currently standing at the opening of a tent at the top (north) part of the map. Your first step is to head south from the tent. Can you please describe what you see as you move south?
I can see a dog and fire

Awesome! You're on the right track. Now, please make a left (east) turn and continue for a few steps until you reach a small bonfire north of the trail. Let me know when you get there and describe what you see along the way.
I am there
Fantastic! Now, the path diverges from the trail and you need to pass the fire on your left (north). Continue heading east on the trail. Please describe what you see as you make your way there.
I can see a mushroom
Great job! Keep going east on the trail until you pass under two red mushrooms. Once you've reached the mushrooms, let me know what you see.
I can see a car is trying to cross the river

Hmm, that's not quite right. Remember, when you reach the two red mushrooms, you are not supposed to touch the car. Instead, make a right u-turn and head back west to where the road forks. Can you please go back to the mushrooms and describe what you see there?
I can see few trees
That's close, but not quite right. Please backtrack a bit from the mushrooms and try again. Let me know what you see once you're back at the mushrooms.
I can see fire bonfire and a dog

I apologize for the confusion earlier. It seems that we missed a step. You should leave the trail, overtake the fire on your left (north), and then continue heading east. Once you've passed the fire, describe what you see as you continue heading east.
I can see a fence

Apologies for the confusion earlier. It seems there was a miscommunication. You need to continue east until you reach a small bonfire north of the trail. Please make your way there and let me know what you see when you arrive.
